Dependencies\Code
We need to copy the following folders to this folder:

GLFW\include\GLFW\
glm\glm\
glew\include\GL\
slang\include\

slang library (repository: https://github.com/shader-slang/slang)


Dependencies\Libraries
We need to copy the following files to this folder:
GLFW\lib-vc2019\glfw3.lib
glew\lib\Release\x64\glew32s.lib
slang libraries folder that contains slang.lib & gfx.lib

Dependencies\Binaries
slang folder: gfx.dll, gfx.slang, slang.dll, slang-slang, slang-glslang.dll, slang-glsl-module.dll

Properties
C	preprocessor -> GLEW_STATIC
C	general -> $(SolutionDir)Dependencies\Code
Linker	general -> $(SolutionDir)Dependencies\Libraries
Linker	input -> glfw3.lib;opengl32.lib;user32.lib;gdi32.lib;shell32.lib;glew32s.lib;Winmm.lib;slang.lib;gfx.lib
Build Events -> Post-Build Event -> Command Line: call "$(ProjectDir)copy_dlls.bat" "$(OutDir)"
